Title: Relates to the imposition of sales taxes on goods or services purchased from businesses which employ 20 or less persons
Summary: Provides that the tax imposed upon the sales on goods or services purchased from businesses which employ twenty or less persons, are resident in this state, are independently owned and operated and not dominant in their field shall be two percent.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the imposition of sales taxes on goods or services purchased from certain businesses
